subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pablo Sandoval hit three home runs and Barry Zito channeled an ace and third base sent a meek out into never-never land for a double — there just has to be a magic wand in San Francisco.
snippet: Pablo Sandoval hit three home runs and Barry Zito channeled an ace and third base sent a meek out into never-never land for a double — there just has to be a magic wand in San Francisco.
